title: Adani Group merges subsidiaries with Adani New Industries
description: Adani Enterprises has merged its subsidiaries, Adani Infrastructure Private Limited and Mundra Solar Technology Limited, with Adani New Industries Limited. Adani Infrastructure focuses on real estate, thermal, and solar power projects. Mundra Solar deals with electricity production and distribution. ANIL, a wholly-owned subsidiary, handles the group's low-carbon projects like green hydrogen, wind turbines, and solar modules.
